        public static boolean processKey(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt)
        Processes a KeyEvent. This method is called when the player is writing a message.
        Parameters:
        evt - KeyEvent that happened
        Returns:
        true if message is complete and control can be returned to other KeyListeners
